command.text: select "BillRegister"."BillRegisterID" "BillRegisterID" ,"BillRegister"."BillRegisterNo" "BillRegisterNo" ,"BillRegister"."BillDate" "BillDate" ,"BillRegister"."SupplierID" "SupplierID" ,"Supplier"."AccSubName" "SupplierAccSubName" ,"SupplierAccSubType"."AccSubType" "SupplierAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"BillRegister"."ProductDescription" "ProductDescription" ,"BillRegister"."Reference" "Reference" ,"BillRegister"."Quantity" "Quantity" ,"BillRegister"."UnitPrice" "UnitPrice" ,"BillRegister"."BillAmount" "BillAmount" ,"BillRegister"."AccFundID" "AccFundID" ,"AccFund"."AccFundName" "AccFundAccFundName" ,"BillRegister"."ProjectID" "ProjectID" ,"BillRegister"."PaidAmount" "PaidAmount" ,"BillRegister"."VchrTranID" "VchrTranID" ,"BillRegister"."VchrTypeID" "VchrTypeID" ,"BillRegister"."ExpenseHeadAccID" "ExpenseHeadAccID" ,"BillRegister"."HeadAccID" "HeadAccID" ,"HeadAcc"."AccName" "HeadAccAccName" ,"HeadAccAccBalType"."AccBalType" "HeadAccAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"HeadAccAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyName" "HeadAccAccCurrencyAccCurrencyName" ,"HeadAccAccDest"."AccDest" "HeadAccAccDestAccDest" ,"HeadAccAccDestCompanyType"."Description" "HeadAccAccDestCompanyTypeDescription" ,"HeadAccAccFund"."AccFundName" "HeadAccAccFundAccFundName" ,"HeadAccAccSubType"."AccSubType" "HeadAccAccSubTypeAccSubType" ,"HeadAccAccType"."AccType" "HeadAccAccTypeAccType" ,"HeadAccCoaControl"."AccName" "HeadAccCoaControlAccName" ,"HeadAccCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalType" "HeadAccCoaControlAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"HeadAccCoaControlAccDest"."AccDest" "HeadAccCoaControlAccDestAccDest" ,"HeadAccCoaControlAccType"."AccType" "HeadAccCoaControlAccTypeAccType" ,"HeadAccCoaControlCompType"."Description" "HeadAccCoaControlCompTypeDescription" ,"HeadAccCoaMain"."AccName" "HeadAccCoaMainAccName" ,"HeadAccCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalType" "HeadAccCoaMainAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"HeadAccCoaMainAccDest"."AccDest" "HeadAccCoaMainAccDestAccDest" ,"HeadAccCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundName" "HeadAccCoaMainAccFundAccFundName" ,"HeadAccCoaMainAccType"."AccType" "HeadAccCoaMainAccTypeAccType" ,"HeadAccCoaMainCoaControl"."AccName" "HeadAccCoaMainCoaControlAccName" ,"HeadAccCoaSub"."AccName" "HeadAccCoaSubAccName" ,"HeadAccCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalType" "HeadAccCoaSubAccBalTypeAccBalType" ,"HeadAccCoaSubAccDest"."AccDest" "HeadAccCoaSubAccDestAccDest" ,"HeadAccCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundName" "HeadAccCoaSubAccFundAccFundName" ,"HeadAccCoaSubAccType"."AccType" "HeadAccCoaSubAccTypeAccType" ,"HeadAccCoaSubCoaControl"."AccName" "HeadAccCoaSubCoaControlAccName" ,"HeadAccCoaSubCoaMain"."AccName" "HeadAccCoaSubCoaMainAccName" ,"BillRegister"."RevAccID" "RevAccID" ,"BillRegister"."Bankname" "Bankname" ,"BillRegister"."ChequeNo" "ChequeNo" ,"BillRegister"."ChequeDT" "ChequeDT" ,"BillRegister"."IsPost" "IsPost" ,"BillRegister"."PostDate" "PostDate" ,"BillRegister"."IsPartialPay" "IsPartialPay" from "dbo"."BillRegister" "BillRegister" left join "dbo"."AccSubNames" "Supplier" on "BillRegister"."SupplierID" = "Supplier"."AccSubCode" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "SupplierAccSubType" on "Supplier"."AccSubTypeID" = "SupplierAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "AccFund" on "BillRegister"."AccFundID" = "AccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."CoaDetail" "HeadAcc" on "BillRegister"."HeadAccID" = "HeadAcc"."CoaDetailID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "HeadAccAccBalType" on "HeadAcc"."AccBalTypeID" = "HeadAccAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccCurrencys" "HeadAccAccCurrency" on "HeadAcc"."AccCurrency" = "HeadAccAccCurrency"."AccCurrencyID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "HeadAccAccDest" on "HeadAcc"."AccDestID" = "HeadAccAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "HeadAccAccDestCompanyType" on "HeadAccAccDest"."CompanyType" = "HeadAccAccDestCompanyType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "HeadAccAccFund" on "HeadAcc"."AccFundID" = "HeadAccAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccSubTypes" "HeadAccAccSubType" on "HeadAcc"."AccSubTypeID" = "HeadAccAccSubType"."AccSubTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "HeadAccAccType" on "HeadAcc"."AccTypeID" = "HeadAccAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "HeadAccCoaControl" on "HeadAcc"."CoaControlID" = "HeadAccCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "HeadAccCoaControlAccBalType" on "HeadAccCoaControl"."AccBalTypeID" = "HeadAccCoaControlAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "HeadAccCoaControlAccDest" on "HeadAccCoaControl"."AccDestID" = "HeadAccCoaControlAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "HeadAccCoaControlAccType" on "HeadAccCoaControl"."AccTypeID" = "HeadAccCoaControlAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CompanyTypes" "HeadAccCoaControlCompType" on "HeadAccCoaControl"."CompType" = "HeadAccCoaControlCompType"."CompTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "HeadAccCoaMain" on "HeadAcc"."CoaMainID" = "HeadAccCoaMain"."CoaMainID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "HeadAccCoaMainAccBalType" on "HeadAccCoaMain"."AccBalTypeID" = "HeadAccCoaMainAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "HeadAccCoaMainAccDest" on "HeadAccCoaMain"."AccDestID" = "HeadAccCoaMainAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "HeadAccCoaMainAccFund" on "HeadAccCoaMain"."AccFundID" = "HeadAccCoaMainAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "HeadAccCoaMainAccType" on "HeadAccCoaMain"."AccTypeID" = "HeadAccCoaMainAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "HeadAccCoaMainCoaControl" on "HeadAccCoaMain"."CoaControlID" = "HeadAccCoaMainCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaSub" "HeadAccCoaSub" on "HeadAcc"."CoaSubID" = "HeadAccCoaSub"."CoaSubID" left join "dbo"."AccBalTypes" "HeadAccCoaSubAccBalType" on "HeadAccCoaSub"."AccBalTypeID" = "HeadAccCoaSubAccBalType"."AccBalTypeID" left join "dbo"."AccDests" "HeadAccCoaSubAccDest" on "HeadAccCoaSub"."AccDestID" = "HeadAccCoaSubAccDest"."AccDestID" left join "dbo"."AccFunds" "HeadAccCoaSubAccFund" on "HeadAccCoaSub"."AccFundID" = "HeadAccCoaSubAccFund"."AccFundID" left join "dbo"."AccTypes" "HeadAccCoaSubAccType" on "HeadAccCoaSub"."AccTypeID" = "HeadAccCoaSubAccType"."AccTypeID" left join "dbo"."CoaControl" "HeadAccCoaSubCoaControl" on "HeadAccCoaSub"."CoaControlID" = "HeadAccCoaSubCoaControl"."CoaControlID" left join "dbo"."CoaMain" "HeadAccCoaSubCoaMain" on "HeadAccCoaSub"."CoaMainID" = "HeadAccCoaSubCoaMain"."CoaMainID"
